ygData.subject: Holy Swords only ONE per server? Is this right?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all- I am a bit new to this list, so this might have come up before.  But it seems from some recent discussions (mostly about ghoulsbane) that there is
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all-

I am a bit new to this list, so this might have come up before. But it
seems from some recent discussions (mostly about ghoulsbane) that there is
only ONE of each holy sword per server. Is that right?

I guess it would cut down on the camping for them, like with dervish rings
and other now common magical items, as well as encourage many a young
paladin to an untimely death!

If this is the case, I really dont think it is a good idea. The whole idea
of a Paladin (for me) is to fight with holy arms against evil. I suppose it
would be okay if there is some generic Holy weapon that ALL paladins can
get, with just some Unique ones.

It really would encourage me to restart my Paladin on the very next server
that opens if this is the case!
